thread.title: Big Boy demolition and historic rehabs planned in Detroit's Islandview
thread.title_full: Big Boy demolition and historic rehabs planned in Detroit's Islandview

author: Paula Gardner | PaulaGardner@mlive.com
title: Big Boy demolition and historic rehabs planned in Detroit's Islandview
text: One of Detroit's most active development teams sees the potential in large-scale projects that will have immediate and obvious impact on the central city. But they also recognize how, in a city the size of Detroit, targeted smaller projects deliver value...
